sk1.name: Magic Missile
sk1.desc: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

sk2.name: Wave of Terror
sk2.desc: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path.

sk3.name: Vengeance Aura
sk3.desc: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases nearby friendly units' physical damage. If Vengeful Spirit is slain, her killer will be possessed with a negative Vengeance Aura, reducing the damage of her killer and its nearby allies until Vengeful Spirit revives.

sk4.name: Nether Swap
sk4.desc: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
